subject: Fix MPC key generation order and post-login navigation
body:
MPC Key Generation:
- Fixed "Device setup is incomplete" error by calling initEmbeddedWalletCore
  BEFORE assignWallet in Auth.store.ts
- SDK requires deviceId via initializeCore before wallet operations
- Fixed premature getMyDevices() call for new users in FireblocksSDK.store

Post-Login Navigation:
- AuthCallback now checks for deviceId before deciding route
- New users (no deviceId) go directly to /login showing GetStarted
- Existing users (has deviceId) go to dashboard
- Fixed LoginPage using wrong redirect function (was for loaders, not components)
- Disabled unused NEEDS_RECOVERY status check to fix TypeScript error

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
title: Fix MPC key generation order and post-login navigation
